Uses of Package
de.apporiented.hermesftp.exception

  • Packages that use de.apporiented.hermesftp.exception 
    Package Description
    de.apporiented.hermesftp.cmd
    Contains interfaces and abstract base classes implemented / extended by FTP command classes.
    de.apporiented.hermesftp.cmd.impl
    Contains the implementation of all FTP command classes.
    de.apporiented.hermesftp.common
    Contains utility classes, interfaces or abstract classed used throughout the application.
    de.apporiented.hermesftp.console
    Contains interfaces and classes associated with the web based administration console.
    de.apporiented.hermesftp.exception
    Contains classes related to FTP server exceptions.
    de.apporiented.hermesftp.parser
    Contains interfaces and abstract base classes related to FTP command parsing.
    de.apporiented.hermesftp.parser.impl
    Contains the concrete FTP command parser implementations and related classes.
    de.apporiented.hermesftp.server.impl
    Contains the concrete FTP server implementations and related classes.
    de.apporiented.hermesftp.session.impl
    Contains the concrete FTP session implementation and related classes.
    de.apporiented.hermesftp.usermanager
    Provides for the basic interface implemented by user managers.
    de.apporiented.hermesftp.usermanager.impl
    Implements a concrete user manager that is based on xml configuration files.
    de.apporiented.hermesftp.usermanager.model
    Provides for the internal data model of the user manager configuration.
    de.apporiented.hermesftp.utils
    Contains utility classes used throughout the project.
  • Classes in de.apporiented.hermesftp.exception used by de.apporiented.hermesftp.cmd 
    Class and Description
    FtpCmdException
    Exception that is generated by FTP commands.
    FtpException
    Parent exception.
  • Classes in de.apporiented.hermesftp.exception used by de.apporiented.hermesftp.cmd.impl

    FtpCmdException
    Exception that is generated by FTP commands.
  • Classes in de.apporiented.hermesftp.exception used by de.apporiented.hermesftp.common 
    Class and Description
    FtpConfigException
    Generated on configuration errors.
    FtpException
    Parent exception.
    FtpQuotaException
    Exception thrown by the FTP server when a client has reached quota limits.
  • Classes in de.apporiented.hermesftp.exception used by de.apporiented.hermesftp.console 
    Class and Description
    FtpConfigException
    Generated on configuration errors.

  • Classes in de.apporiented.hermesftp.exception used by de.apporiented.hermesftp.parser 
    Class and Description
    FtpIllegalCmdException
    Exception that is thrown by the command reader if an unrecognized command token is received from the client.
  • Classes in de.apporiented.hermesftp.exception used by de.apporiented.hermesftp.parser.impl
